name: EMEA-DC-ONPREM-COMPUTE-CLUSTER
description: Production compute cluster - Server Hall A (6 ESXi hosts)

name: EMEA-DC-ONPREM-STORAGE-CLUSTER
description: vSAN storage cluster - Server Hall B (4 ESXi hosts)
comments: Hosts: EMEA-DC-ONPREM-ESX-B01 through EMEA-DC-ONPREM-ESX-B04. vSAN enabled for storage.

name: EMEA-DC-ONPREM-MGMT-CLUSTER
description: Management cluster - vCenter, NSX, monitoring (3 ESXi hosts)
comments: Hosts: EMEA-DC-ONPREM-ESX-MGT01 through EMEA-DC-ONPREM-ESX-MGT03. Runs vCenter, NSX Manager, vROps.
